name: Pokémon Memorial Garden
description:
The Pokémon Memorial Garden is a space to honour the Pokémon who have fallen during a trainer's journey.

Since I am constantly playing through Pokémon games with Nuzlocke rules, the Memorial Garden will be updated after every run (whether successful or failed).

Current graves: 155

Current trainers: 7

Current Champions: 3

-

Written by Hamish McIntyre.

Cover art by Philadelphia Hanson-Viney.
